name: Wavestorm Foam Bodyboard 40" Complete 2 Pack

name: Rokia R Bodyboard 42 Inch Premium EPP Core Body Board for Beach with Durable XPE Cover Reinforced Reticular Structure Board Great Surfing for Teens and Adult Include Leash
short_description: [STRUCTURE]: Surface: Premium XPE full cover; Core: Durable EPP and double wood strip reinforced structure; Bottom: reinforced PE plate; Base Course:plastic mesh reinforcement layer. Integrated hot melt molding, the bodyboard is no damage and waterproof.

[HIGH QUALITY]: Compared with other body board, it has better durability,light resistance and physical impact resistance.As the core of EPP,the body board has stable chemical properties,is not easy to decompose,has no smell and has good elasticity,environmentally friendly.The double wood strip structure provides better strength and bending resistance to the body board.

[WHAT IS A GOOD BODYBOARD]: A suitable weight is about 4.5bls,more durable and incomparable to ordinary EPS boards,perfect design Bottom crescent tail and two water flow rail.Bring faster speed and better manipulation experience to surfers.
[Where to find fun]: You can go to the beach,seaside,lake,park and stream.Wherever there is water,it can give you happiness with family with friends.

[BODYBOARD SIZE]:42" bodyboard 4.5bls weight,measures 42" x 22" x 2.5" can carry a 200 lbs surfer,providing the best sea experience for surfers over 16 years old.Provide the most high-performance bodyboard for mid-level surfer and professional bodyboarders.
product_description: Rokia EPP Body board Structure:XPE full cover; Core: EPP and double wood strip; Bottom:PE plate; Base Course:plastic mesh reinforcement layer. Integrated hot melt molding SIZE:bodyboard 4.5bls weight,measures 42" x 22" x 2.5" Accessories: Advanced double turn 4FT leash Best fit:4.5FT-6FT height and under 200 lbs weight.

name: BPS ‘Storm’ Pro 42.5" Body Board for All Wave Conditions – Lightweight BodyBoards for Beach with EPS Core HDPE Slick Bottom IXPE Deck with Wrist Leash and Plug for Kids and Adults
short_description: STOP STRUGGLING and START SMILING 😃 We know it can be a real struggle to figure out the right bodyboard for you or your family – so we use our 30 years of water sports experience (for ourselves and our own kids) to get it right FOR YOU. After starting in a Kiwi garage, we have now helped hundreds of thousands of customers 'get to their happy'. So get ready to ‘look like a legend’ and start making great memories straight out of the box.

EXPECT HAPPY FACES AND LIFELONG MEMORIES 🤗 Designed for PEAK Performance, the Storm PRO Body board has a Pro grade IXPE Deck Thermo fused to an Ultra lightweight EPS Core with an embedded fiberglass stringer. Our deck shape helps you nail the all-critical hand and elbow placement, while the fiberglass stringer adds strength, and an HDPE bottom skin reinforced with hex mesh means insane speed. Expect balance, maneuverability and speed in all wave conditions for riders up to 200lbs.

GET MORE WAVES 🌊 No one likes running or swimming after lost body boards so each pack includes an adjustable and comfortable premium BPS coiled wrist leash with a neoprene cuff and durable Velcro. The tight coiling prevents kinking, dragging, or snagging on submerged objects. Want body boards for beach days? We’ve got you covered.

WE GUARANTEE IT'S RIGHT FOR YOU! 🤝 Have I? Did I? Will I? make the right choice? No one wants uncertainty - so we guarantee you have made the right choice. We remain a founder-run small family business, and all our products come with our ‘Right Choice Guarantee’; we'll replace or refund your item if you are not satisfied. From down here in NZ we genuinely want you to ‘get to your happy'. And reach out to us with ANY questions - we have always prided ourselves in good old-fashioned Kiwi service!

START SMILING STRAIGHT AWAY 📧 Download your body board’s e-guide in the Product Guides and Documents section on this page. If you encounter any difficulty finding it, simply reach out to us by clicking 'Sold by' on this listing page and select 'Ask a question'.

PERFECT FOR EVERYONE 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 If you have a kid wanting to step up or an adult looking to catch some serious waves, the BPS 'STORM' PRO Bodyboard is designed to be the right swimming board for people of all skill levels. With its lightweight construction and compact size, it’s easy to take with you on all your beach adventures.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS 🌞 To keep your bodyboard in top condition: cover it with a towel if there’s no shade, rinse with fresh water after each use, store it flat, and avoid prolonged exposure to direct sunlight.

name: THURSO SURF 42'' Body Boards for Beach Pool Lightweight PE Core IXPE Deck HDPE Bottom FRP Stringers High Performance Body Board with Double Swivel Surf Leash and Bodyboard Bag Lightning
short_description: - Stable and Easy to Ride: Made for all wave conditions, this body board with nose bulbs is the High performance surf board for surfers of all ages and skill levels. The 42 inch PE Body Boards is the right size for surfers up to 200 lbs

- Premium PE CORE: Our 42'' bodyboard is extremely lightweight, crafted with high-grade PE closed cell material, ensuring durability and optimal performance in both warm and cold waters. Provides you a superior surfing experience

- Boosts Speed and Control: Each Professional surf boards adults has an HDPE Slick Bottom. It’s reinforced with mesh and features dual channels, a crescent tail and 60/40 rail. Meanwhile, with our heat sealing process, it makes sturdier than regular glued tabla de surf

- Offers Great Flex and Floatation: The IXPE deck has channel nose bulbs that evenly distribute weight and provide more grip. With 2 FRP stringers, this waveboard provides you with a highly flexible and ultra-buoyant base

- Experience worry-free surfing: Buy with confidence knowing that your purchase is protected by our 1-year quality warranty and it comes with Bodyboard leash+body board bag, ensuring your satisfaction

name: WOOWAVE Bodyboard 33-inch/37-inch/42-inch Premium IXPE Body Board with Coiled Wrist Leash, Super Lightweight EPS Core and HDPE Slick Bottom, Perfect Surfing for Kids Teens and Adults
short_description: ☞【DURABLE CONSTRUCTION AND LIGHTWEIGHT】The WOOWAVE Body Board is super light, comes with coiled wrist leash, features a high speed EVA surface, EPS core and HDPE slick bottom surface for great performance, offers impact strength durability, buoyancy and increase speeds.

☞【HIGH QUALITY AND STRONG MATERIAL】Designed and developed to allow every boarders to have great control of the bodyboard. The premium coiled wrist leash included will keep your board attached to you at all times and the cuff is super comfortable.

☞【WONDERFUL SURFING EXPERIENCE】A lightweight body board equipped a water-resistant core which are suitable for all waves conditions. On the hot summer, you can use our body board to enjoy wonderful and exciting surfing experience in the sea, beach, river.

☞【DYNAMIC DESIGN FOR YOU】 A stylish design with 33-inch / 37-inch / 42-inch size and bright colors for you to choose and give you the best surfing fun. This high quality bodyboard is designed for beginners and more experienced boarders.

☞【1-YEAR QUALITY WARRANTY】Your purchase includes a hassle-free Money Back Guarantee and a free replacement exchange one year. If the body board gets damaged, just feel free to contact our customer service team with a photo, we are willing to replace it FOR FREE.

name: Wham-O Boogie Boards, 33" Body Board for Beach, Lightweight Bodyboard with Wrist Leash for Beginners and Kids
short_description: SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION – Crafted with an advanced Phuzion core (high-density EPS core), this Wham-O body board ensures unmatched durability, impact strength, and rigidity, providing the perfect balance, maneuverability, and speed in all wave conditions.

UNIQUE FIBER CLAD COVER – The fiber-clad cover of the Wham-O bodyboards enhances durability and resilience, ensuring a long-lasting performance while the sleek design adds to the board's aesthetic appeal.

STYLISH DESIGN – With a 33" board size and beautiful patterns, this boogie board offers the best surfing fun, making it ideal for beginners and experienced boarders alike, ensuring hours of excitement at the beach, river, pool, or waterpark.

PREMIUM WRIST LEASH – Designed for maximum safety and comfort, the included detachable wrist leash keeps your board attached to you at all times, providing great control and preventing it from getting lost in the ocean.
LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE – These reliable body boards are lightweight and easy to carry, perfect for family trips to the beach, pool, or any outdoor adventure, ensuring endless fun on the waves.
product_description: Get ready for endless fun on the waves with the Wham-O 33" Bodyboard. Crafted with a Phuzion core, this fiber-clad body board offers unmatched impact strength, durability, and rigidity. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced boarder, experience perfect balance, maneuverability, and speed in all wave conditions. Featuring a stylish design and beautiful patterns, this boogie board ensures the best surfing fun for riders of all ages. The premium wrist leash keeps your board attached to you at all times, ensuring peace of mind and preventing it from getting lost in the ocean. Lightweight and portable, these bodyboards are perfect for beach trips, pool days, or any outdoor adventure, providing hours of excitement for the whole family.

name: Wavestorm Foam Bodyboard
short_description: The Wavestorm 40in bodyboard dimensions are 40" L x 20.25" W x 2.175" Thick | Weight is 1.8lbs | Volume at 6.55 Liters | Recommended weight capacity at 180lbs. The board comes with a wrist leash. Excellent for youth to adult. Buoyant and rigid enough for performance wave riding.

Generous volume and boxy rail great for flotation and drive. Volume helps to keep riders above water allowing for buoyancy and less drag while maintaining an overall light board weight. Thermal-molded and wrapped slick rail creates a stronger construction and less rail delamination.
Contoured and textured deck with rail grips, nose grips, and elbow texture creates a secure ride.
Smooth and rigid slick bottom with channels add rigidity and creates a smooth glide for wave riding.
UV inhibiting soft graphic deck features a patented technology for graphics to last longer, preserve color, and improve resistance to water absorption.
Sport type: Bodyboarding
product_description: The Wavestorm Body Board is 40 inches in length; excellent for recreational fun at the ocean, lake, or pool; large enough size for youths or adults; and constructed with quality patented materials and craftsmanship. Each foam bodyboard is lightweight and strong. Featuring a superior expanded foam core and smooth HDPE (High Density Polyethylene) slick bottom for extra rigidity, speed, and recoil. Each board is meticulously crafted for attention to detail with a UV inhibiting patented color deck skin over a molded contoured deck for improved grip in critical areas while riding. Wavestorm surfing body boards all feature hot air lamination with no use of harmful glues or epoxies during construction. Each body board includes a basic wrist leash to help secure riders to the board. Each board is created with the Wavestorm assurance of Quality that any deemed faulty materials are covered under warranty and your satisfaction is of utmost importance. We will respond immediately to any questions or concerns about products Thank you for choosing Wavestorm.
